channel.title: Divine World™ | Pk Based |1 Min To Start Pking | Excellect Economy | Skilling
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/52Usq.png[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][URL=http://"www.divine-world.org"]Forums[/URL][B][/B] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.divine-world.org/index.php?page=Webclient"]Play Now[/URL] | [URL=http://img208.imageshack.us/i/7yx9m.png/][IMG]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/8561/7yx9m.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://"dl.dropbox.com/u/53909731/DivineWorldV3.jar"]Download Client[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vWodDoMHCxg"]Promo Vid[/URL]
[size=18pt]Short Server Introduction[/size]
[B]Server[/B] This server is run on a 24/7 Vps from myhosting.com that has anti-Dos protection. I am currently working on the new paid domain. All donations are [U]ONLY[/U] being used on server maintanace and improvements.
[B]Pking[/B] The home is based in edgeville, all the shops contain everything you need. It takes 60 seconds to start pking by typing in ::mainstats for maxed combat and ::melee or ::hybrid for pk gear and you're ready! [B][U]This server is not "prodded" in any way or has any op weapons/armour, All nex items have been removed from the economy, pvp armours/spirit shields are all very rare drops from Bosses. Pking on Divine World takes skill and not luck/constant ramboing.[/U][/B] [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KBgK9mJjo5M"]Click Here to see the pking side of this server, skip to 0:45 for actual gearing up.[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rDIX3VYH5Do"]Click Here to see Smooth, no drag, sensitive switching [/URL]
[B]Skilling[/B] Skillers teleport to Entrana island, which is where all skills are trained, they can also sell their resources to shops for the best money making ways. [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tRk-rb7gnds&feature=plcp"]Click Here for a skilling preview[/URL]
[B]Economy/Pvm[/B] The economy is excellent, all pvp armours/spirit shields/god wars armour are rare drops from Bosses. [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vWodDoMHCxg"]Click Here for the Official Divine World Promo Vid.[/URL]
[B]Community[/B] The Community is full of wonderful and helpful players, the staff team are very active and are willing to help out anytime. The forums are active[U](3400+ posts and 300 members)[/U] and we do not tolerate any flaming in game/forums.
[B]History[/B] Server has been online for nearly 4 months+ No Economy reset since it started, undupable on.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ftpiu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HWI6t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/F9jN4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XXslX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8nTwz.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kLSfj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jz77E.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4dtmv.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Main Server Features[/size]
[*]100% Uptime, Vps Dos Protection [*]Active Owner and Daily updates [*]Active Staff ingame/forums that contribute alot [*]Forums is clean and filled with guides [*]4 Minigames, 6 Bosses, 3 dangerous pk spots and 2 safe pk spots (single/multi combat) [*]Near perfect melee max hit formula with each weapon [*]Near perfect magic max hit formula with each weapon/spell [*]Near perfect range max hit formula with each weapon/arrows/bolts [*]Switching is smooth, no drags, very sensitive, [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rDIX3VYH5Do"]Click Here to see a clip[/URL] [*]All skills work including hunter and are all based in Entrana island [*]Each resourceful skill can be used to earn coins, be selling the resources to shops [*]Players who achieve 99 in all stats are rewarded completionist capes and many more, [URL=http://"http://www.divineworld.smfnew.com/index.php?topic=164.0"]Click here.[/URL] Currently 5 have achieved this. [*]Players who achieve 30m xp in all skills are rewarded with even better rewards, currently 3 have achieved this. [*]All 3 different level clue scrolls with different rewards, 3rd age armour/santas/h'ween masks are obtainable from level 3 clue scroll rewards, all clue scrolls are drops from different Npcs [*]Lottery System in game [*] Nearly all known Rs items are included in the economy.
[B]Credits to: Sanity, Raw Envy, M G T & Rune-Server.[/B]
[I]Feeling the urge to try Divine World yet ?[/I] ^.^
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][URL=http://"http://www.divine-world.org"]Forums[/URL][B][/B] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.divine-world.org/index.php?page=Webclient"]Play Now[/URL] | [URL=http://img208.imageshack.us/i/7yx9m.png/][IMG]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/8561/7yx9m.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://"dl.dropbox.com/u/53909731/DivineWorldV3.jar"]Download Client[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vWodDoMHCxg"]Promo Vid[/URL]
[U]Also, please do not post plain negative posts that have no reason behind it, i would rather you post constructive criticism, so i can improve upon it :)[/U]

item.title: Divine World™ | Pk Based |1 Min To Start Pking | Excellect Economy | Skilling
item.dc:creator: @M_G_T M G T
item.description:
@M_G_T wrote:


Forums Play Now | Download Client | Promo Vid

[size=18pt]Short Server Introduction[/size]

Server
This server is run on a 24/7 Vps from myhosting.com that has anti-Dos protection. I am currently working on the new paid domain. All donations are ONLY being used on server maintanace and improvements.

Pking
The home is based in edgeville, all the shops contain everything you need. It takes 60 seconds to start pking by typing in ::mainstats for maxed combat and ::melee or ::hybrid for pk gear and you’re ready!
This server is not “prodded” in any way or has any op weapons/armour, All nex items have been removed from the economy, pvp armours/spirit shields are all very rare drops from Bosses. Pking on Divine World takes skill and not luck/constant ramboing.
Click Here to see the pking side of this server, skip to 0:45 for actual gearing up.
Click Here to see Smooth, no drag, sensitive switching

Skilling
Skillers teleport to Entrana island, which is where all skills are trained, they can also sell their resources to shops for the best money making ways. Click Here for a skilling preview

Economy/Pvm
The economy is excellent, all pvp armours/spirit shields/god wars armour are rare drops from Bosses. Click Here for the Official Divine World Promo Vid.

Community
The Community is full of wonderful and helpful players, the staff team are very active and are willing to help out anytime. The forums are active(3400+ posts and 300 members) and we do not tolerate any flaming in game/forums.

History
Server has been online for nearly 4 months+
No Economy reset since it started, undupable on.


HWI6t.png772×552



kLSfj.png762×501

jz77E.png758×498

4dtmv.png763×503

[size=18pt]Main Server Features[/size]

[]100% Uptime, Vps Dos Protection
[]Active Owner and Daily updates
[]Active Staff ingame/forums that contribute alot
[]Forums is clean and filled with guides
[]4 Minigames, 6 Bosses, 3 dangerous pk spots and 2 safe pk spots (single/multi combat)
[]Near perfect melee max hit formula with each weapon
[]Near perfect magic max hit formula with each weapon/spell
[]Near perfect range max hit formula with each weapon/arrows/bolts
[]Switching is smooth, no drags, very sensitive, Click Here to see a clip
[]All skills work including hunter and are all based in Entrana island
[]Each resourceful skill can be used to earn coins, be selling the resources to shops
[]Players who achieve 99 in all stats are rewarded completionist capes and many more, Click here. Currently 5 have achieved this.
[]Players who achieve 30m xp in all skills are rewarded with even better rewards, currently 3 have achieved this.
[]All 3 different level clue scrolls with different rewards, 3rd age armour/santas/h’ween masks are obtainable from level 3 clue scroll rewards, all clue scrolls are drops from different Npcs
[]Lottery System in game
[] Nearly all known Rs items are included in the economy.

Credits to: Sanity, Raw Envy, M G T & Rune-Server.

Feeling the urge to try Divine World yet ? ^.^

Forums Play Now | Download Client | Promo Vid

Also, please do not post plain negative posts that have no reason behind it, i would rather you post constructive criticism, so i can improve upon it

Read full topic
